result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher J Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Advised of Constitutional Rights.  Defendant informed of charges and penalties.  Factual basis and probable cause found.  Court accepts pleas as voluntarily and knowingly and intelligently made. Count 2 and 16CF22 & 15CF437 all dismissed and read in. Sentencing: 15CF83 Count 1 - Sent. W/H; 3 yrs prob. Cond: 1 yr. jail - 3 days credit with huber and EM if qualifies. $2023 + $35 (blood) + $250 less $225 (assess. credit) for a total of $2083. 33 mos. DL rev. retro. 250 hrs. comm. serv. (completed). Couns/Treat per agent. 1 yr II, DNA Sample, AODA/DSP;   Not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Not to go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.  Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.
Review hearing on September 28, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Christopher J Smith in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Lawrence Jean Broeren appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed.   Atty S Schlough appearing for Atty J Loso.  Bond cont'd.  Review hearing scheduled for August 16, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 9, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Review hearing on August 9, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Defendant Christopher J Smith in court.  Lawrence Jean Broeren appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed.  Atty J Loso not present.  Sentencing Hearing to be set.  Bond cont'd.

Defendant Christopher J Smith in court with attorney Joseph H. Loso.  Chad David Verbeten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed. Bond cont'd.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 6, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Christopher J Smith in court with attorney Joseph H. Loso.  Steven Howard Gibbs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed. Bond cont'd.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 29, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Not to possess or consume any alcohol or controlled substance not prescribed by authorized medical personnel.  Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs. Follow conditions of other bonds.
Defendant Christopher J Smith in court with attorney John Francis Manydeeds.  Defendant Christopher J Smith in custody.  Roy La Barton Gay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed.
